title: The Acer One Cloudbook 14, a super affordable Linux laptop?
description:
Buy in The US: http://amzn.to/2wgwr5k
Buy in The UK: http://amzn.to/2v66amE
More at fascinatingcaptain.com: https://goo.gl/G8rHmP
Let’s take a look at how this laptop works under Linux because at a $200 price point this Cloudbook has some pretty good specs.

Music:
